How can I export funds from a PBaaS chain to VRSCTEST using the command line?

To export funds from a PBaaS chain to VRSCTEST, you can use the `sendcurrency` command with the following format:

```json
verus -chain=PBaaSChain sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"your_address","amount":10, "convertto":"VRSCTEST","exportto":"VRSCTEST","via":"Bridge.PBaaSChain"}]'
```

This command will export the specified amount of funds from the PBaaS chain to VRSCTEST, using the Bridge on the PBaaS chain.

to VRSCTEST:**
 ```json
 verus -chain=PBaaSChain sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"RXLYm4J6qi7yam9zXtkEkRwbvCrnWKGZuv","amount":10, "convertto":"VRSCTEST","exportto":"VRSCTEST","via":"Bridge.PBaaSChain"}]'
 ```
